description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study – orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
variable referring to the option available on the right side from the experimenter perspective -either a tool (ball or stick) or a reward (banana pellet)
variable referring to the option available on the left side from the experimenter perspective -either a tool (ball or stick) or a reward (banana pellet)
variable referring to the type of apparatus presented on a given trial - ball (apparatus where the participant had to use the ball) / stick ( apparatus where the participant had to use the stick)
the choice participant made - tool (ball or stick) / reward (banana pellet/grape/ apple)
the type of food inside the apparatus (banana pellet)
